translation.en: [Travis] What are you doing, Bean? I'm making the Pit of Doom.
translation.it: - Che fai, Bea? - Scavo la Fossa del Destino.

translation.en: It's a deadly trap for catching really dangerous things.
translation.it: È una trappola mortale per catturare cose molto pericolose.

translation.en: Wanna help? It'll be fun. We just want the dirt.
translation.it: - Mi aiutate? Sarà spassoso. - Vogliamo la terra.

translation.en: Lots and lots of dirt.
[sighs] Fine, take some.
But not too much. I know how you guys work.
translation.it: Ma non troppa. So come siete voi due.

translation.en: "Pinch of lilac."
"Strand of hair dark as night."
"Toe of dead frog?"
translation.it: INCANTESIMO DI INVISIBILITÀ - INGREDIENTI "Zampa di rana morta"? Forse non serve davvero.

translation.en: Maybe I don't need that.
translation.it: "Zampa di rana morta"? Forse non serve davvero.

translation.en: Clear as water.
Light as air.
Circle three times.
The first with care.
[Katrine] Ivy! I'm starting breakfast. Coming!
Though you won't see me.
Three steps forward.
Fourth, if you dare.
Look straight to the glass. You will not be there.
translation.it: Non sarai nello specchio. Se gli occhi lì posi.

translation.en: Yes! Yes!
Invisibility is mine!
[Ivy] Wondrous!
Hey. Pancakes sound good, or is it more of a waffles-for-the-weekend thing?
translation.it: Ehi. Vuoi i pancake o preferisci i waffle nel week-end?

translation.en: You can see me?
Yes. Is that the right answer?
I guess I do need a frog.
[Travis] Bean's pit isn't gonna catch anything.
translation.it: Bea non prenderà niente con la fossa.

translation.en: [Trevor] Yeah, trapping pits are normally rectangular.
translation.it: Le trappole sono rettangolari di solito.

translation.en: -[Travis] Yeah. -[Trevor] Yeah.
[Travis] Bean should stick to sandcastles. [Trevor] Yeah.
translation.it: - Dovrebbe fare castelli di sabbia. - Sì.

translation.en: -[Nancy] Hey, Bean-breath! -[Bean gasps] Breakfast! Come in.
translation.it: Ehi, Bea la belva! La colazione! Vieni.

translation.en: Like, now.
Mom said.
[Bean] Here's your breakfast!
Ew, ew! Get those worms away.
translation.it: Ecco la tua colazione. - Via! - Mi aiuti con la Fossa del Destino?

translation.en: Wanna help make the Pit of Doom?
translation.it: - Via! - Mi aiuti con la Fossa del Destino?

translation.en: It's gonna be awesomer than that cave we made. I do not play make-believe in the dirt anymore.
translation.it: - Sarà più bella della grotta. - Non faccio più questi giochi.

translation.en: Well, you do play make-believe that you're a grown-up.
[Bean] Just because you're 12 doesn't make you the boss of me, Nancy.
translation.it: Anche se hai 12 anni non puoi comandarmi, Nancy.

translation.en: -[Nancy] Little sisters are so annoying! -[Bean scoffs, grunts]
[boy] Over here.
Leo! You have to come over after breakfast!
We have to finish the Pit of Doom today, okay?
translation.it: Oggi finiamo la Fossa del Destino, ok?

translation.en: -[buzzing continues] -What?
I said you have to come over after breakfast and finish the--
translation.it: Ho detto che devi venire dopo colazione per finire…

translation.en: Sorry, Mrs. Trantz. It was an accident.
Accidents are what happen when little children don't behave.
translation.it: I bambini si comportano male e capitano incidenti.

translation.en: [gasps] Dottsy! Do not let Bernice Blue interrupt your tinkle time.
translation.it: Dottsy. Non permettere che Bernice Blue interrompa la tua pipì.

translation.en: Oh-hoo-hoo! You did it! Ooh! It's a good one too.
Aw. Yeah.
We don't like children. Do we, Dottsy? [gasps]
translation.it: Non ci piacciono i bambini, vero?

translation.en: We don't because they're yucky and mucky and icky, icky, icky.
translation.it: Perché sono rivoltanti, ributtanti e ripugnanti.

translation.en: All right, my baby. Okay, let's do this.
[Mrs. Trantz] Just remember, I have your mother's phone number.
translation.it: Ricordati che ho il numero di tua madre.

translation.en: [Charlotte] Bean! Breakfast!
[Charlotte] I have to take the girls shopping later. Wanna come?
translation.it: Andiamo a fare shopping. - Vieni? - Hai detto qualcosa?

translation.en: [David] La, la, la. Were you saying something?
[Charlotte] Do you want to take the girls shopping?
translation.it: - Vieni? - Hai detto qualcosa? Porti tu le ragazze?

translation.en: [David] Sorry, I can't hear you, so I probably can't help.
translation.it: Non ti sento. Non so cosa farci.

translation.en: Mom, there's a place that does ear-piercing right by where we're shopping today.
translation.it: Oggi potrei farmi i buchi alle orecchie.

translation.en: Not happening.
If Mrs. Trantz calls, it was an accident. Again, Bean?
translation.it: - Incidente con la Trantz. - Di nuovo?

translation.en: Hey, Dad, Leo and me are going to finish the Pit of Doom today.
translation.it: Oggi, me e Leo finiamo la fossa.

translation.en: -[ringing continues] -"Leo and I." Subject pronoun.
Hello, Mrs. Trantz.
[Mrs. Trantz on phone] She is out of control.
Do you mean my pit? The one I was digging for the tree?
translation.it: Intendi la mia fossa per l'albero?

translation.en: Yes! It's in case any bears or bad guys come into our yard.
translation.it: Sì! Se orsi o cattivi entrano in giardino,

translation.en: They'll fall in and be trapped.
You actually think you're gonna catch a bear? And then what?
translation.it: Credi di catturare un orso? E poi?

translation.en: I could train her and take her to this week's show-and-tell.
translation.it: Lo addestro e lo mostro a scuola.

translation.en: Well, if I were you, I'd be sure to consider the standing height of your average grizzly.
translation.it: Tieni conto dell'altezza di un grizzly comune

translation.en: So you know how deep to dig the pit.
[David] Oh, yeah!
Yes, Bean does get distracted. -I don't know where she gets it from. -[David] Yeah!
translation.it: Sì, Bea è distratta. Non so da chi abbia preso.

translation.en: Come on, Nancy. Show us how it's done.
[Bean] Nancy?
That's our rule. We hear the music, and we have to dance.
translation.it: È la nostra regola. Se c'è musica, si balla.

translation.en: Grow up. The rules have changed.
Remember?
[Nancy] You signed it.
[Charlotte] Your mother never let you? Really?
[Mrs. Trantz] My mother would never have…
[Nancy] Be kind.
Tell the truth.
Listen to others.
No name-calling, and no playing tricks.
-[loud slurping] -And no slurping your cereal.
No being gross on purpose.
Sometimes being gross on purpose is useful.
translation.it: A volte è utile fare schifezze di proposito.

translation.en: You know that if you break three rules in one day, that's it.
translation.it: Sai che se infrangi tre regole in un giorno, è finita.

translation.en: Serious consequences.
You… are infuriating!
-[Charlotte] Yes. Yes. Bye. -Oh, hey, Bean. Bean. Bean.
translation.it: Sì. Buona giornata. Bea, cerca di restare pulita oggi perché…

translation.en: -[David] Try to stay clean today because-- -[sighs]
translation.it: Bea, cerca di restare pulita oggi perché…

translation.en: You and I are taking Nancy shopping in a bit for school clothes.
translation.it: A Nancy servono dei vestiti per la scuola.

translation.en: -You might wanna get something too. -[Bean shouting] No!
translation.it: - Magari ti prendi qualcosa anche tu. - No!

translation.en: Yes, that's your child.
Any plans for today? [sighs] I'll be here doing research.
translation.it: - Programmi per oggi? - Devo fare delle ricerche.

translation.en: I need to find a frog. Oh, like one for a pet?
translation.it: - Mi serve una rana. - Come animaletto?

translation.en: More like one that's old and getting ready to donate his body to science and/or magic.
translation.it: Meglio una vecchia, pronta a donare il corpo alla scienza e alla magia.

translation.en: [frog croaks] Oh, I'd love to donate my body to magic.
translation.it: Vorrei donare il mio corpo alla magia.

translation.en: Well, um, frogs, I hear, are found outside.
translation.it: Da quanto ne so, le rane si trovano fuori.

translation.en: So come and get some fresh air. Outside.
You know, that girl across the street, she seems nice.
translation.it: La bambina di fronte sembra carina.

translation.en: Wouldn't you wanna join them? Make a new friend? -[kids yelling outside] -Bean?
translation.it: - Vuoi farti una nuova amica? - Bea?

translation.en: No thanks. [chuckles] What's wrong with Bean?
translation.it: - No, grazie. - Cos'ha che non va Bea?

translation.en: She just runs around and makes noise.
translation.it: Non fa che correre in giro e urlare.

translation.en: Well, why do you say that?
-[Bean] I can make more noise than you! -[indistinct shouting]
translation.it: So urlare più forte di te!

translation.en: Okay. But, you know, you don't even really know her yet.
translation.it: Ok, ma non la conosci ancora bene.

translation.en: Who knows? You might change your mind. I won't change my mind.
One thing I do know about Bean is she has no imagination.
translation.it: Una cosa che so di Bea è che non ha immaginazione.

translation.en: I tiptoed up to the edge of the Pit of Doom,
translation.it: Ho raggiunto in punta di piedi la Fossa del Destino

translation.en: and there was this kind of snuffling sound below.
translation.it: e di sotto ho sentito qualcuno che tirava su col naso.

translation.en: At first, I thought it was Leo with a bad cold,
translation.it: Subito ho pensato che Leo fosse raffreddato,

translation.en: but when I looked in…
There it was.
[boy] It's humongous!
That's not gonna happen, Bean.
The only thing that's going to fall in this pit is you.
translation.it: L'unica a cadere qui dentro sarai tu.

translation.en: -[Bean grunts] -Hey! Watch the cleats. I have a game this afternoon.
translation.it: Ehi! Non sulle scarpe. Ho una partita nel pomeriggio.

translation.en: Why would you want to play something you have to stay clean for?
translation.it: Fai un gioco in cui si resta puliti?

translation.en: I like the uniform.
[Bean] I'm gonna get you!
[Mrs. Trantz] A perfect neighborhood is one without leaves or children.
translation.it: In un quartiere perfetto non ci sono foglie né bambini.

translation.en: Isn't that right, Dottsy? [chuckles]
Hey, babe.
-Oh, thank you. -Uh-huh.
Remember when it felt that easy? Everything was so… under control.
translation.it: Ti ricordi quando era così facile? Era tutto sotto controllo.

translation.en: You mean, back when we had just one kid?
It was nice.
-Now, two kids. -Mm. -Double the learning experience. -[Charlotte chuckles]
translation.it: Con due figlie, doppia esperienza di apprendimento.

translation.en: -Yeah, well… -[kids laugh in distance] What do you think we'll be learning about today?
translation.it: Già, cosa pensi che apprenderemo oggi?

translation.en: [Bean] I'm gonna get you! -Get away from me! -[Charlotte and David scream]
-[Charlotte] Bean! -[Leo] Get away from me!
Just wanna wash your uniform for you!
-No! No! [yelps] -[Dottsy barking]
[whimpers] Sorry. Sorry. Sorry.
You! You! You!
[David] Mrs. Trantz?
-Oh! I… -I can help you.
All right, handsy! -Dottsy! Come back to mama. -[Dottsy barking]
translation.it: Via le mani! Dottsy! Torna dalla mamma.

translation.en: [Mrs. Trantz] Ow, ow, ow! Don't trip.
You and I have different interpretations of clean.
translation.it: Noi due abbiamo un'idea diversa di "pulito".

translation.en: I am clean, mostly.
-[bike bell rings] -The water just washed off all the dirt.
translation.it: L'acqua ha tolto quasi tutta la terra.

translation.en: Mine.
-[door opens] -[Nancy] Mom!
I'm ready.
Bean, as a favor to me and my sanity,
go inside, take a shower, and put on something clean.
translation.it: Lavati e mettiti dei vestiti puliti.

translation.en: Please don't make me go, Mom.
-Shopping sucks my bones. -[sighs]
[Nancy] Mom, I think red makes my eyes pop.
translation.it: Il rosso mi fa risaltare gli occhi.

translation.en: [Charlotte] What color says, "I value my education"? Bean, don't lie on the floor.
translation.it: Che colore fa risaltare l'importanza dello studio? Alzati.

translation.en: Please, can we leave? This is taking forever.
translation.it: Andiamo via? Siamo qui da un'eternità.

translation.en: What do you think?
I think it's gonna be night soon, which means burglars and bears.
translation.it: Penso che presto sarà notte, e arriveranno ladri e orsi.

translation.en: Bean, get off the floor.
Please, I wanna get home and dig the pit before it's too late.
translation.it: Voglio finire la fossa prima che sia troppo tardi.

translation.en: It's hard, and nobody's helping.
translation.it: - È dura, nessuno mi aiuta. - Ho un'idea.

translation.en: I have an idea. Why don't you ask the new girl?
translation.it: - È dura, nessuno mi aiuta. - Ho un'idea. - Chiedi alla nuova vicina. - Ely?

translation.en: -Ivy? -[Charlotte] Yes.
translation.it: - Chiedi alla nuova vicina. - Ely? Sì.

translation.en: She seems nice.
Nice is boring.
She wears headbands. Why do you think Ivy's boring?
translation.it: - Porta i cerchietti. - Perché la trovi noiosa?

translation.en: Because she is. All she does is read.
translation.it: Lo è. Non fa altro che leggere.

translation.en: At recess, Mom. She reads at recess.
Well, Ivy just moved here, Bean. She probably doesn't have friends yet.
translation.it: Si è appena trasferita. Non avrà amici.

translation.en: I think I'll get it.
[Charlotte] Hmm. I think this hem's a little short.
[woman] Okay. Right here.
What? What is this? Okay.
-Bean, what are you doing? -Nothing. Nothing. Nothing. Nothing. Nothing.
-Mom? -Hmm?
It's kinda expensive.
Am I getting extra clothes allowance? Now that I'm not a kid anymore.
translation.it: Paghetta extra per i vestiti? Sono grande.

translation.en: Oh, for the love of Betsy, just get the dang skirt!
translation.it: Per l'amor di Dido, prenditi quella cavolo di gonna!

translation.en: Don't be such a tightwad. What did you call me?
translation.it: - Non fare la taccagna. - Cosa mi hai detto?

translation.en: Where on Earth did you hear that?
Grandma. Who's Betsy?
It's just an expression. Calling someone a tightwad is rude, Bean.
translation.it: È solo un modo di dire. Dare a qualcuno del taccagno è maleducato.

translation.en: Apologize to Nancy, please.
Yeah. Apologize.
[in sing-song] I'm sorry you're such a tightwad.
translation.it: Mi dispiace che tu sia così taccagna.

translation.en: can you behave for ten minutes?
translation.it: ti comporti bene per dieci minuti?

translation.en: -Please. -[sighs]
Wouldn't pierced ears look great with my hair like this?
translation.it: Gli orecchini starebbero bene coi capelli così.

translation.en: Nice try.
[Bean] Let's trick the tightwad.
[Bean] Come on, Nancy.
Take the bait.
[Nancy] Very funny, Bean.
[Bean] I am not Bean.
I am the ghost of Mr. Killop.
translation.it: Sono il fantasma del sig. Killop.

translation.en: I can see your pants.
[Bean] I lived in this house until I died of bad breath and busted boils.
translation.it: Sono morto in questa casa di alito cattivo e putridi brufoli.

translation.en: So I haunt the bush in front of it.
translation.it: Ora sto nel cespuglio di fronte a te.

translation.en: Get out of there, Bean. [Bean] Stay away!
Or in the dark of night, icy fingers will wrap around your neck.
translation.it: O, di notte, dita gelide si stringeranno intorno alla tua gola.

translation.en: Help!
Let go! [groans]
My tiny delicate bone.
You broke my arm.
I did not.
You okay?
-[Bean groaning] -I didn't mean to.
[Bean] Fooled ya! Silly big sister!
I got you!
Nope.
I got you.
You know the rules.
Three strikes, you're out.
I didn't break three rules. You called me a tightwad.
translation.it: - Non sono tre. - Mi hai detto "taccagna".

translation.en: That breaks rule one. "Be kind."
Two, you tried to trick me with fake money.
translation.it: Due, volevi imbrogliarmi con soldi finti.

translation.en: "No playing tricks."
Three, you just lied about your arm being broken.
translation.it: Tre, hai mentito dicendo di avere il braccio rotto.

translation.en: "No lying."
There's four. You wiggled your butt.
translation.it: La quarta. Mi hai mostrato il sedere.

translation.en: And five and six.
But it doesn't even matter because you're already gonna face serious consequences.
translation.it: Ma non fa niente, ci saranno comunque gravi conseguenze per te.

translation.en: Oh, yeah? See if I care.
translation.it: Ah, sì? Non me ne importa.

translation.en: And I'm not getting consequences in my face because I'm running away.
translation.it: Non ci saranno conseguenze, perché scappo di casa.

translation.en: Mom! -Mom! -[huffs]
-Mom! -And you'll never ever find me!
Not even if you hire a detective.
-[Charlotte] What? What? What? -[gasps]
I don't know. And she was reeling it into the bush,
and then I pulled her out, and she turned around, and she wiggled her butt at me…
translation.it: l'ho tirata fuori e mi ha fatto così…

translation.en: [whispers] Follow me.
Come to my backyard. If you dare.
translation.it: Vieni da me. Se hai il coraggio.

translation.en: The coast is clear.
But from here on in, you have to put on this.
translation.it: Ma ora ti devo mettere questa.

translation.en: Why?
Because it's a secret passageway.
[Ivy whispers] No peeking.
Do everything I say so you won't get hurt.
translation.it: Fai come ti dico e non ti succederà niente.

translation.en: -Run! -[Bean yelps]
You can look now.
You've run away.
-[Ivy] Persephone, say hello to Bean. -[Persephone] Bonjour, Bean.
It's my secret garden. Did you read that book?
translation.it: È il mio giardino segreto. Conosci il libro?

translation.en: I'll bring lots of food and blankets. I'm only running away until dinner.
translation.it: - Ti porto cibo e coperte. - Scappo solo fino a cena.

translation.en: What's the puddle for?
It's not a puddle. It's a pond. A frog pond.
translation.it: Non è una pozza. È uno stagno per rane.

translation.en: A pond for a guppy maybe. If I was a frog, I don't think I'd want to live there.
translation.it: Forse per un pesce. Se fossi una rana, non vorrei vivere lì.

translation.en: But would you wanna die there?
[Bean] Wouldn't you get in trouble if your mom found out I was hiding here,
translation.it: Non finirai nei guai, se tua madre scopre

translation.en: and it was your idea?
I forgot, kids like you don't get in trouble. I do too!
translation.it: - Quelle come te non finiscono nei guai. - Invece sì.

translation.en: For what? Reading books? You can't get in trouble for reading.
translation.it: Per cosa? Non si finisce nei guai leggendo libri.

translation.en: I will get in trouble, huge trouble. If I do what I wanna do.
translation.it: Finirò in grossi guai se farò ciò che ho in mente.

translation.en: What's that?
Spells, magic, potions.
Hang on.
Are you some kind of… witch?
-You are a witch! -A witch in training.
Although Grandma tells me
that I probably know more than some born witches.
translation.it: che forse ne so di più delle streghe vere.

translation.en: This is so organized.
I made it so there's separate places for toys, potions, reading,
translation.it: Ho creato postazioni separate per giochi, pozioni, lettura,

translation.en: sleeping, and dress-up.
Oh, and this is my doll collection.
translation.it: Ecco la mia collezione di bambole.

translation.en: Meet Ellie and Esmerelda. Periwinkle. Quite the gossip.
translation.it: Sono Ellie ed Esmerelda. Linguetta. Che pettegola.

translation.en: And this is Annie and Sophie.
Is this a mummy?
I'm gonna build a pyramid to bury her in.
translation.it: Voglio costruire una piramide per seppellirla.

translation.en: Nice!
So, what spells can you do?
I just learned the spell that makes you dance forever.
translation.it: So fare quello che fa ballare per sempre.

translation.en: And I'm working on a spell that makes you invisible.
translation.it: E sto lavorando a uno che rende invisibili.

translation.en: Let's do it, right now! I would, except I need a dead frog.
translation.it: - Facciamolo ora. - Vorrei, ma mi serve una rana morta.

translation.en: It'd be mean to kill a frog. That's why I'm building a pond.
translation.it: - Non bisogna ucciderle. - Per questo ho lo stagno.

translation.en: So, a frog will move in and die of old age.
translation.it: Ci andrà una rana e morirà di vecchiaia.

translation.en: That's pretty smart.
This part is really secret.
[Ivy] My witch's robe.
Whoa, Nelly!
[Ivy] Watch this.
It's my spell book.
This is so amazing.
Where did you get this? My grandma sent it to me.
translation.it: - Dove l'hai trovato? - Me l'ha mandato mia nonna.

translation.en: Is she a witch-in-training too? She says that she isn't, but I have my doubts. Hmm.
translation.it: - È una strega apprendista? - Dice di no, ma non ci credo.

translation.en: And… my magic wand!
translation.it: CAVALLO VELOCE COME UN'AQUILA INCANTESIMO E la mia bacchetta magica!

translation.en: That's just a stick It's a wand.
translation.it: - È solo un bastoncino. - È una bacchetta.

translation.en: And you better watch out, or I'll use it on you.
translation.it: E, stai attenta, o la userò su di te.

translation.en: I'll make you dance forever!
[gasps] You just gave me the best idea.
Let's do the spell on Nancy.
She deserves it for being such a booger-head.
translation.it: Se lo merita, perché è una testa di caccola.

translation.en: So, a spell would be perfect.
Especially, if we made you look like a real witch.
translation.it: Soprattutto se sembri una strega vera.

translation.en: I am a real witch.
No offense, but you don't look it.
translation.it: Senza offesa, ma non lo sembri.

translation.en: [Bean] Do you have any face paint, fake blood,
translation.it: Hai colori per il viso, sangue finto,

translation.en: glue, maybe some scissors?
Um, Bean never came in. Do you know where she is? I told you, she ran away from home.
translation.it: - Bea non è tornata. Sai dov'è? - Te l'ho detto. È scappata di casa.

translation.en: Could you go find her, please?
Are those mine? [Nancy] Why?
What is the point? You're not even gonna punish her.
translation.it: A che pro? Non la metterai in punizione.

translation.en: She'll be cleaning her room all afternoon. Now go find your sister.
translation.it: Si pulirà la camera tutto il pomeriggio. Trovala.

translation.en: Fine. I wouldn't wear these anyway.
translation.it: Va bene. Non li metterei comunque.

translation.en: -Did you make them or something? -No. I didn't make them.
translation.it: - Li hai fatti tu? - No. Non io.

translation.en: I made them.
[sighs] Just remember what we'll be saying in another 15 years.
Fifteen years, we'll be basking somewhere
-on a wonderful beach, alone. -Ooh, I like that idea.
-Oh, my gosh. -Margaritas.
♪ We'll be alone ♪
[both] ♪ No babies, no kids ♪
-♪ It's happy ♪ -♪ All happy ♪ -♪ It's optimal ♪ -♪ We're good ♪
[both] ♪ No babies in the house no more ♪ ♪ No babies in the house no more ♪
-♪ No kids, no babies ♪ -♪ I know, baby ♪
-You hungry, baby? -♪ No babies ♪
You were right.
I do look amazing.
[sighs] You're going to scare Nancy to death.
-[Nancy] Hey, Bean-breath! -[Bean gasps]
Stop running away this minute, Bean! Mom wants you home! Now!
translation.it: Smettila di nasconderti! La mamma ti vuole a casa! Subito!

translation.en: How soon can we do the spell? Right away. Just need… worms.
translation.it: - Quando facciamo l'incantesimo? - Ora. Ci servono dei lombrichi.

translation.en: [chuckling] Worms? No problem.
[Bean] Let's go get my trowel.
We're on a worm mission.
Oh, yeah.
Let's do this.
-Whoa. -Oh! Hello.
Would that be my eye shadow?
And my trowel?
[sighs] Yup! Hi! I'm Bean.
translation.it: - Già. Sono Bea. - Della casa di fronte.

translation.en: -From across the street. -[Katrine] I know.
translation.it: - Già. Sono Bea. - Della casa di fronte. Lo so. Ciao, piacere. Sono la mamma di Ely, Katrine.

translation.en: Hi, it's nice to meet you. I'm Ivy's mom, Katrine.
translation.it: Lo so. Ciao, piacere. Sono la mamma di Ely, Katrine.

translation.en: So, when did you two start playing? We're not playing. We're on a mission.
translation.it: - Giocate insieme? - Non è un gioco. Siamo in missione.

translation.en: Oh, what a nice idea.
Have fun.
Yes!
[Ivy] Why do moms always say "nice?" Nice is boring. I'm glad you're not nice.
translation.it: Per le mamme è tutto "carino". Che noia. Per fortuna non sei carina.

translation.en: I'm glad you're not nice too.
[Nancy] Bean!
This is the final warning bozo-face. Mom wants you in… here
translation.it: È l'ultimo avvertimento, stupida. Mamma ti vuole a casa,

translation.en: now!
[Nancy] Bean, you're in so much trouble.
We can't go that way. We have to get the worms for the spell before Nancy sees us.
translation.it: Non andiamo di là. Ci servono i lombrichi prima che Nancy ci veda.

translation.en: [Nancy] Come home now!
-But there's no way out there. -[Nancy] Bean?
translation.it: - Ma di lì non si passa. - Bea?

translation.en: You like secret passageways.
Well, this is top secret.
No one will see this passageway to my house.
translation.it: Nessuno ci vedrà entrare nel mio giardino.

translation.en: Really?
[Bean] There are 12 houses in Pancake Court,
translation.it: Sono 12 le case di Pancake Court

translation.en: and I have discovered a secret passageway through all of them.
translation.it: e so di un passaggio segreto che le attraversa tutte.

translation.en: Follow me, and we can get from your backyard
translation.it: Seguimi, e andremo dal tuo giardino

translation.en: to the Pit of Doom undetected.
translation.it: alla Fossa del Destino di nascosto.

translation.en: There we will get the worms, sneak up on Nancy, and do the spell.
translation.it: Là troveremo i lombrichi e faremo l'incantesimo a Nancy.

translation.en: Follow me.
This is Poopy Yard.
I call it no-man's land.
translation.it: Io lo chiamo "la terra di nessuno".

translation.en: [Ivy] Sergeant Bean, there are mines ahead. How do we proceed?
translation.it: Sergente Bea, quante mine! Come procediamo?

translation.en: We have to move fast.
Step exactly where I step.
translation.it: Metti i piedi dove li metto io.

translation.en: [Bean] I've been hit! Ugh!
Soldier down!
[Ivy] Stay with me, Bean. Stay with me.
[Bean] This is enemy territory.
Stay sharp.
Easy.
[Bean] We got this.
[Ivy] Who lives here?
Who's the worst possible person who could live here?
translation.it: Chi è la peggiore che potrebbe abitare qui?

translation.en: [whispers] An ogre!
They're the worst possible.
They're dangerously aggressive and territorial.
And they eat children.
Tidbits, tidbits, yummy, tasty tidbits.
translation.it: Bocconcini succulenti, bocconcini tra i miei denti.

translation.en: Oh! Look at what's cooking in my pot.
translation.it: Ma guarda cosa mi bolle in pentola.

translation.en: -[Dottsy growls] -Dottsy, we're going to eat well tonight.
-[gasps] Little girl soup. Mmm… -[Dottsy barks]
[both in unison] I don't like being soup.
We better keep moving before she sees us. The way out is behind that statue.
translation.it: Proseguiamo prima che ci veda. L'uscita è dietro quella statua.

translation.en: Bean.
Bean!
Do the invisibility spell! -You've got the frog. Do the spell. -[Dottsy barking]
translation.it: Fai l'incantesimo di invisibilità! Hai la rana.

translation.en: Hurry! She's going to see us!
-[Ivy] I need lilac! Lilac! -Hurry. Hurry!
[Bean] Oh, Dottsy. Don't eat the frog.
You two. You stay right there. Right there.
[sighs] We had a frog.
[Mrs. Trantz] Bernice Blue.
Who else could it be except for… you. Whatever you are.
translation.it: Chi altro poteva essere se non… Tu. Chi sei?

translation.en: I'm Ivy, I live over--
Well, "Ivy," do you know anything about trespassing?
Your friend Bernice does not seem to.
Sorry, it was an emergency. Hmm. I don't think you're sorry at all.
translation.it: - Mi spiace, era un'emergenza. - Non credo ti dispiaccia.

translation.en: Though you will be because there are consequences
for coming uninvited into other people's yards.
translation.it: se si viola l'altrui proprietà privata.

translation.en: -Ew, ew! Poo on you. -[Bean groans] [Mrs. Trantz] I feel sick.
I think I might throw up.
Yes, that's the emergency I was telling you about.
translation.it: Ecco l'emergenza di cui le dicevo.

translation.en: Mm… Hmm. Nice try.
translation.it: Ecco l'emergenza di cui le dicevo. Bella mossa.

translation.en: You… [groans] both come in the house while I call-- [groans]
[grunting] Don't you dare.
Go! Run!
Out of my yard! Now!
[Bean] That's what we were doing!
-[Ivy sighs] -Ivy, that was awesome.
[Bean] Be wary.
Sometimes allies, sometimes foes.
translation.it: A volte alleati, a volte nemici.

translation.en: Do you also build pyramids?
Did you take all of my dirt? You can't have all of it.
translation.it: Mi avete preso tutta la terra? Non potete.

translation.en: It is pretty nice.
Homeschooled.
[Ivy] Lucky.
This is Ivy, by the way. Ivy, this is Travis and Trevor. They're twins.
translation.it: Lei è Ely. Loro sono Travis e Trevor. Sono gemelli.

translation.en: But it's important that you respond to us as individuals.
translation.it: Ma è importante che ci tratti come individui.

translation.en: Hi, Travis. Hi, Trevor.
[both in unison] Hey there, Ivy.
-Bye, Travis. Bye, Trevor. -Bye, Travis. Bye, Trevor.
-[Travis] Bye. -[Trevor] Bye.
As soon as you go through, watch out for the Pit of Doom.
translation.it: Appena sei di là, stai attenta alla Fossa del Destino.

translation.en: And crawl along the fence to the playhouse,
so we can figure out whether it's safe or not to get the worms.
translation.it: poi valutiamo se è sicuro prendere i lombrichi.

translation.en: Nancy might be watching, so stay low.
translation.it: Potrebbe esserci Nancy, quindi non farti vedere.

translation.en: And yes, we do build pyramids.
Did you want one with smooth sides or with steps?
translation.it: Ne vuoi una con la superficie liscia o i gradoni?

translation.en: [Ivy] Steps, please.
[Bean] There's the pit.
There's the playhouse.
[Nancy] I've looked everywhere, Mom! Bean's vanished.
translation.it: Ho guardato ovunque, mamma! Bea è sparita.

translation.en: Bean?
So, the first thing we do is get the worms,
translation.it: Allora, per prima cosa prendiamo i lombrichi,

translation.en: then figure out a way to creep up on Nancy.
Here's the spell. "Dance Everlasting."
"Dance and squiggle, worm a-wiggle--"
Just say the magic words and throw the worms. It's pretty simple.
translation.it: Reciti queste parole e lanci i lombrichi. Semplice.

translation.en: Okay, so how many worms, exactly?
Twenty worms, exactly.
Dot--
I just saw worms here. This is a worm place. [groans]
translation.it: Ne avevo trovati tanti. È un posto da lombrichi.

translation.en: Speak to us, oh, wiggly worms.
translation.it: Parlate con noi, o lombrichi sinuosi.

translation.en: Reveal where you are hiding.
Try there.
-Ivy, you're a worm whisperer. -[chuckles]
translation.it: Ely, sei la bambina che sussurra ai lombrichi.

translation.en: Did I ever mention how much Nancy hates worms?
translation.it: Ti ho mai detto che Nancy li odia?

translation.en: I love them.
They're so wet and slimy,
and they can regenerate parts of their bodies.
translation.it: e riescono a rigenerare delle parti del corpo.

translation.en: -[David] And we got lots of tomatoes… -[gasps] …corn, zucchini.
Dad's coming. Hide in the jungle!
-[hissing] -[gasps] A viper!
A cobra!
A viper cobra.
[in unison] The most dangerous kind!
[Bean] Hurry!
[David] Over here, I'd try to plant something new.
And this year was corn and-- [Katrine] Oh, yum.
Yeah, yeah, yeah. You'd be surprised at how quickly they grow.
And… here we are.
Uh… Raccoons?
Maybe. Or bears.
I've heard tell there's a grizzly problem out here.
translation.it: Qui abbiamo problemi con i grizzly.

translation.en: What's my mom doing here? My dad invites everyone over for vegetables.
translation.it: - Perché mamma è qui? - Papà invita tutti a prendere le verdure.

translation.en: My mom says that he has a green thumb.
translation.it: Per mamma ha il pollice verde.

translation.en: But I've checked a bunch of times, and it looks normal to me.
translation.it: Controllo spesso, a me pare normale.

translation.en: …aspect of life. I don't make the rules.
-[whispering] Can they see us? -No way.
I don't know why kids have to run through the garden.
translation.it: Chissà perché i bambini corrono nell'orto.

translation.en: [Katrine] That is way more fun than running through the yard.
translation.it: È più bello che nel giardino.

translation.en: [whispers] Guess what? I just thought of how we can sneak up on Nancy.
translation.it: So come avvicinarsi a Nancy di nascosto.

translation.en: Stay out of my string beans, bears, or be ready to face show-and-tell.
translation.it: State lontani dai miei fagiolini, orsi, o vi faccio vedere io!

translation.en: [inaudible] Danger ahead. Follow me.
Do not understand.
Move like a shadow. Move like a ghost. Move like a ninja.
translation.it: Muoviti come un'ombra. Come un fantasma. Come un ninja.

translation.en: Understood.
[whispers] Dottsy?
You should probably take some tomatoes, too.
-That'd be so great. -Excuse me. Have you seen my Dottsy?
translation.it: - Grazie. - Scusate. Avete visto il mio Dottsy?

translation.en: He's having a moment in my tomatoes.
translation.it: È occupato tra i miei pomodori.

translation.en: Dottsy, did you chase those bad little girls?
-Have you met Mrs. Trantz? -[Mrs. Trantz babbling]
-No, not yet. But, um… -She's very…
-She seems interesting. -Uh, ye-yeah, interesting.
That's not fake crying. That's real crying.
translation.it: Non sta facendo finta. Piange davvero.

translation.en: That's so weird. Nancy never cries.
translation.it: Che strano. Nancy non piange mai.

translation.en: Maybe she's sad because you ran away, and it's all her fault.
translation.it: Forse perché sei scappata ed è colpa sua.

translation.en: [sighs] Maybe she's sorry for being mean. And for never playing with me anymore.
translation.it: Forse le dispiace di essere cattiva e di non giocare mai con me.

translation.en: I bet she wishes she was a better sister.
Now she just sits by the window waiting for your return.
translation.it: Aspetta alla finestra il tuo ritorno.

translation.en: I wouldn't mind a sister like that.
I must go!
Bean is out there!
Somewhere!
I must find her and bring her home! [sobs]
translation.it: Devo trovarla e portarla a casa.

translation.en: -Nancy. -[Nancy] Don't try and stop me!
It's all my fault!
We agree. It is your fault.
You should search for the rest of your life to find your sweet… [bawling]
translation.it: Per il resto della vita cercherai la tua dolce,

translation.en: …and kind and adorable little sister.
[all] Bean!
[sighs] Maybe we shouldn't do the spell.
[sighs] It's probably not fun to dance forever.
translation.it: Non è bello ballare per sempre

translation.en: And not stop until your feet are bloody stumps.
translation.it: e ritrovarsi con i piedi ridotti a monconi.

translation.en: It's so not fair, Mom.
Everyone but me has them.
Everyone.
Even some of Bean's stupid friends.
translation.it: Anche alcune stupide amiche di Bea.

translation.en: We've discussed this a million times, Nancy. You'll get them when you're 13.
translation.it: Ne abbiamo parlato milioni di volte. Li farai a 13 anni.

translation.en: She's not crying about me. She's crying about having her ears pierced.
translation.it: Non piange per me, ma perché vuole farsi i buchi.

translation.en: You're a booger-head! You know that?
translation.it: Sei una testa di caccola! Lo sai?

translation.en: Booger-heads don't wear earrings! Booger-heads just wear boogers!
translation.it: Non puoi metterti orecchini, solo caccole!

translation.en: Mom!
I found Bean!
You are so busted!
Stop! I command you to leave Bean alone!
translation.it: Ferma! Ti ordino di lasciare in pace Bea.

translation.en: I hope you're ready to dance forever!
Until the day you die!
Do the spell.
[chuckles] Is that a magic wand?
It is your doom.
Are you pretending to be some sort of… witch?
translation.it: Fingi di essere una sorta di strega?

translation.en: She is a witch. A witch-in-training.
translation.it: Lo è. È una strega apprendista.

translation.en: "Dance and squiggle, worm a-wiggle, long as you live, you'll always jiggle!"
translation.it: Danza, ti dico, come un lombrico. L'ho già detto? Beh, te lo ridico!

translation.en: You're doing a spell.
I'm so scared.
Stop making fun of my friend. [Nancy] Your friend?
translation.it: - Non prendere in giro la mia amica. - Cosa?

translation.en: I thought you said she's the boring girl who wears headbands and reads at recess.
translation.it: Non era una noiosa che porta i cerchietti e legge a ricreazione?

translation.en: Prepare to dance forever!
[screams] What? No! Stop it! Get them off of me! Get them off!
translation.it: Cosa? No! Smettila! Toglimeli di dosso!

translation.en: Oh! Get them off!
[chuckles] She's… dancing!
[Bean] Oh no. I'm out of worms.
translation.it: Oh, no. Ho finito i lombrichi.

translation.en: Run!
I am going to kill you!
-[David] Nancy! Sweetie. -[panting]
[Bean] She's still dancing.
The spell worked!
-[barking] -Dottsy, no. Stay away from those terrible children.
translation.it: Dottsy, no! Via da quelle orribili bambine!

translation.en: [Mrs. Trantz] Get me out of this pit!
[Trevor] Look! Bean's pit did catch something.
[David] Honey, are you okay?
[Nancy] I don't like dirt!
No dessert and no TV for a week?
translation.it: Una settimana senza dolce e TV?

translation.en: If that's what consequences are, it's not too, too bad.
I don't think your mom was that mad.
translation.it: Tua mamma non era tanto arrabbiata.

translation.en: Mom, help. [crying]
[Charlotte] Nancy, come on. Baby, come on.
-Get up. -[Nancy bawling]
And Dad didn't seem too mad either.
Upsidaisy. You've had quite the day.
translation.it: Venga su. Ha avuto una giornataccia.

translation.en: -[Mrs. Trantz groans] -All right.
Yeah, just give me a little boost here.
translation.it: Sì, magari mi aiuti un pochino.

translation.en: Use your legs. Yeah, use your legs. There you go.
I knew the pit would catch something, but how come Nancy stopped dancing?
translation.it: Sapevo che avrei catturato qualcosa. Ma Nancy non balla più.

translation.en: Isn't it a forever spell?
Yeah, but we didn't have 20 worms, so it only half worked.
translation.it: Sì, ma non avevamo 20 lombrichi. Ha funzionato a metà.

translation.en: [sighs] We'll have to do it again.
translation.it: Sì, ma non avevamo 20 lombrichi. Ha funzionato a metà. Dovremo rifarlo.

translation.en: What if we do the dancing spell on Mrs. Trantz?
translation.it: Perché non lo facciamo alla sig.ra Trantz?

translation.en: We can do it on the people who keep the dog in the Poopy Yard.
translation.it: O a quelli del cane nel Cortile della Cacca.

translation.en: Imagine if they had to dance forever around poop!
translation.it: Balleranno per sempre intorno alle cacche!

translation.en: Excuse me, but your plans for tomorrow may not include
translation.it: Scusate, ma in futuro niente incantesimi

translation.en: spells on neighbors, terrorizing your sister,
translation.it: ai vicini, spaventi a tua sorella,

translation.en: dog poop, worms, or Pits of Doom. Is that clear?
translation.it: cacche di cane, lombrichi, Fossa del Destino. Chiaro?

translation.en: It's almost time for supper. Do you wanna walk Ivy home? -Yes! -[Charlotte chuckles]
translation.it: - È ora di cena. Porti a casa Ely? - Sì!

translation.en: [Bean] You know what's so weird? I did use to think you were boring.
translation.it: Sai una cosa strana? Un tempo ti credevo davvero noiosa.

translation.en: [Ivy] I thought you were boring.
I thought all you ever did was read.
I thought all you ever did was run around making noise.
translation.it: Non facevi altro che correre in giro e urlare.

translation.en: Do you really not like headbands?
translation.it: Davvero non ti piacciono i cerchietti?

translation.en: No way!
Are you sure?
I'm sure.
See you tomorrow?
And the day after that. And the day after that.
translation.it: - E anche dopodomani. - E anche dopodomani.

translation.en: Bye, Bean! [Bean] Bye, Ivy!
[kid] Did you win, Leo?
[Leo] No, but I was great.
That bathroom is haunted.
translation.it: Il bagno è infestato dai fantasmi.

translation.en: Sometimes it's easier to feel the ghost.
translation.it: È più probabile avvertire un fantasma.

translation.en: It's like a cold wind passing right through you.
translation.it: È come un vento freddo che ti attraversa.

translation.en: I am honored to welcome you to curriculum night.
[David] Where is Bean off to?
[Nancy] You can bet she's up to something nefarious.
Hide!
[principal] Where's your hall pass?
Detention!
[principal] Hello, my lovelies.
[man] And marker.
♪ Tell me the things you let me know ♪ ♪ No need to rush, we'll take it slowly ♪
It's a tomato.
♪ The difference in us is hard to prove ♪ ♪ Guess I just have to get To know you, but… ♪
Yeah.
Oh, it looks like I'm crying.
[man] Cut! Nice.
-♪ I think we do get along just right ♪ -[speaking indistinctly]
-[screaming] -[all laughing]
♪ Not too far There's a place just for us two ♪
